inclusion.criterion: Men and women, ages of 18-65 years, inclusive.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants will have a DSM-5 bipolar disorder that is clinically stable.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants will be obese (defined as a BMI ≥ 30 mg/kg2) or overweight (defined as BMI ≥ 27 kg/m2) with at least one weight-related comorbidity, such as hypertension, type 2 diabetes, or dyslipidemia.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants in treatment for a weight-related comorbidity (hypertension, type 2 diabetes, and/or dyslipidemia) must be on a stable and allowed treatment regimen for that condition for at least 3 months prior to study enrollment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants will be able to provide informed consent before any trial-related activities.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: dementia, a psychotic or depressive disorder, or a substance use disorder within the past three months;
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: those with clinically significant psychotic features or suicidal ideation;
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: those with serious or unstable general medical illnesses;
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of dementia, psychosis, and substance use disorder within the past three months. They also have clinically significant psychotic features and suicidal ideation.
